10x10 Board

Piece Lengths:
5 4 3 3 2

[ Connecting ]
P1 connects to server... waits
P2 connects to server
Server pairs P1 and P2


[P1's Turn]
Server --> P1 [ Start Turn ]
P1 --> Server [ Attack Square ]
Server --> P2 [ Attack Square ]
P2 --> Server [ Hit/Miss ]
Server --> P1 [ Hit/Miss ]

[P2 Turn]
Server --> P2 [ Start Turn ]
P2 --> Server [ Attack Square]
...

opcodes:

'a' - send attack
'r' - send result
